column5: Rumour has it, though I'm gonna need to see pictures.
we may not have proof as we all decided to be only c&r today so Lloyd released them at the side of the boat..so no ego shots....
So no proof?  Well at least you were out Terry, that's better than my day and you were in great company!  Any shots of the spent lemon wedges.
I heard the same rumour....sounds like a good way was had by all
Didn't think I got proof... but I most certainly did!!
i bet it put up on heck of a fight ...hope it didnt ruin the net from all the thrashing around
I forgot that one  I don't think you are helping my creditability Wayne
Hey... it was the best I could do. Running out of steam... I haven't had a napppy like you did!!
FishHunter caught it.  .. and it was your turn to reel one of his fish in.
Naaa.. he was actually reeling in to change hooks and snagged the bugger in a bait ball. We'll give him this one Andy! lol
